app_settings=(value)

summary: The application specific settings for the person. remarks: An application can store person preferences and other settings for the person in the Microsoft Health Service. These settings are automatically returned when GetPersonInfo is called but can also be retrieved through the use of GetApplicationSettings. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Methods::SetApplicationSettings::AppSettings
